text:
@realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar Captain Chaos...you don’t need a “perception”. You are definitely better at chaos then silly media. Own it and keep it.
And by the way...Jay-Natalie was 4 months old when she got COVID-19 and died from it.😞 https://t.co/Dh3hEeQFAE
